alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 11:43AM MST until December 23 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations half to 3 inches. * WHERE...Lemhi Pass, Bannock Pass, Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, and Salmon. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A cold front moves through causing a period of intense snow during the overnight hours. Patchy icy conditions are expected on roadways until sunrise.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
